laboratory_examinations.findings: Lipase level was 491 U/L, which is outside the normal range.

Liver is normal in echogenicity, portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow, common bile duct measures 2 mm (normal), gallbladder filled with gallstones (unchanged), no gallbladder wall thickening or pericholecystic fluid.
